scripts.clean: turbo clean && rm -rf node_modules && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.audit:code:
echo 'üîç Checking for unused dependencies...' && pnpm dlx depcheck --ignore-bin-package --ignores='@types/fs-extra,@types/js-yaml,@types/prompts,lint-staged,prettier,ts-node,ts-prune' && echo '
üßπ Checking for unused exports (variables, types, functions, etc.)...' && pnpm dlx ts-prune --project tsconfig.base.json --error
scripts.lint:help:
echo '
üßπ Available lint, test, and audit commands:
  pnpm lint:fix     - Clean imports + format code
  pnpm lint:imports - Remove unused imports + order them
  pnpm format       - Format code with Prettier
  pnpm lint         - Run ESLint with auto-fix
  pnpm audit:code   - Find unused dependencies + dead code
  pnpm test         - Run tests with Vitest
  pnpm test:ui      - Run tests with Vitest UI
  pnpm test:run     - Run tests once (no watch)

ü™ù Pre-commit hook: Automatically runs lint:imports + format on staged files
'
